data.text:
@texter888 Bella, twr is playing around with my account. Have only just seen your post. Pls let's not argue. I have never masked or distanced & no intention of having untested vaccine for a flu scam. Here for Political prisoner #MelanieShaw. 
Love your forensic science progs & Dr Jan G

@DOLWOAS I didn’t say communism was too harsh a word. I was speaking about children being tossed in the middle of this that shouldn’t have to deal with grownup problems.  So you are from the UK?  What kind of untested vaccines are they giving you?  ☮️🙏
